intro.title: Hi, I'm Konrad
intro.subtitle: CS Master Student & Software Developer
intro.content: I'm a Computer Science master's student with a passion for building useful software products and web applications. When I'm not studying, I work on freelance projects and develop my own tools and products.

sections.title: Background
sections.content: My journey into software development started during my undergraduate studies when I discovered the joy of solving real-world problems through code. Since then, I've been continuously learning and building projects that range from customer websites to complex web applications.

sections.title: What I Do
sections.content: I specialize in web development, primarily working with modern JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks like React and Next.js. I enjoy the full spectrum of development - from designing user interfaces to architecting backend systems and databases.

sections.title: Interests & Hobbies
sections.content: Beyond coding, I'm fascinated by system design, developer tools, and the intersection of technology and user experience. I enjoy contributing to open-source projects and sharing knowledge through technical writing.
